overview: Chiharu, who lives alone in a slightly outdated apartment, is about to pass the age for marriage, but she can't stop having an affair with Hiroki. One day, Noriko, Hiroki's wife, visits Chiharu's room alone and asks her to leave her husband. Chiharu does not respond. And Hiroki also visits Chiharu's room as usual.
title: Can't Cut It
